title: WTB these T205 Broad Leaf backs
author: gonzo

posts.post_title: WTB these T205 Broad Leaf backs
posts.post_content:
Please PM here with scans/photos and asking prices.

Looking for these T205 Broad Leaf backs in Fair or better (without paper loss).

John Bates
Mordecai Brown
Dick Hoblitzell
Zach Wheat
Harry Wolter

Also looking for T205 Drum or Hindu backs, and T205 freaks, such as multistrikes, miscuts with parts of two different cards visible, and other interesting oddities.
Thanks!
